C:/home/LearnHVAC/spark/class/safquot.cm File Reference

Numerically robust quotient operator c = a / b based on the safprod.cc atomic class. More...

Detailed Description

Numerically robust quotient operator c = a / b based on the safprod.cc atomic class.

Note that safprod.cc implements the inverse relation in a residual form to avoid divsion by zero.

Equations:
 0 = a - c * b
